# Welcome to My Portfolio

This portfolio documents my learning journey in Public Policy Analytics (CPLN 5920).

## About This Course
Advanced spatial analysis and data science for urban planning and public policy.

## Portfolio Structure
- **Labs:** Completed assignments and analyses
- **Final Project:** Capstone modeling challenge

## About Me
I am an associate professor in the Department of City and Regional Planning at Penn. I direct the smart city concentration
within our Masters in City Planning program. This is my first time teaching PPA. I have previously taught Sensing the City (an Arduino-based course on using microsensors for dynamic and responsive cities) and GIS.
